titleStmt.title: Mr. Johnson's speech which he deliver'd to his friend to be printed (as he mention'd at the place of execution.)
titleStmt.author: Wall, John, Saint, 1620-1679.

notesStmt.note: Francis Johnson is one of the pseudonyms employed by Saint John Wall.
Possibly issued with "A narrative of the proceedings and tryal of Mr. Francis Johnson a Franciscan, at Worcester, last summer-assizes, anno Dom. 1679" (Wing J773).
